## BaseError.(constructor)

Create a new typed error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(message: string, ...nested: Array<Error>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | error message |
|  nested | Array&lt;Error&gt; | internal errors (causes) |
